title: Drawing, "Vertical Panel in Three Sections, Wallpaper Design", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
signed:
Signed in graphite, lower right:  Parzinger [another signature erased beneath]/#6;
graphite, lower center: GLIMMER GRUND (Shiny ground)
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: GLIMMER/GRUND  [between two words is a horizontal line with arrows at each end indicating the width of the vertical panel]
description: Central panel: thin red and white pole decorated with stylized flowers, leaves and a strawberry; side panels: upper quadrants, blue and white checks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vertical Panel in Three Sections, Wallpaper Design", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Donald Cameron. 1998-19-133.
